
name: Gradle Wrapper Validation and Workflow Zip

on:
  push:
    paths:
      - '**.gradle*'
      - 'gradle/wrapper/**'
      - '.github/workflows/**'
  pull_request:

jobs:
  validate-and-zip:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up JDK 17
        uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        with:
          distribution: 'temurin'
          java-version: '17'

      - name: Validate Gradle Wrapper
        run: ./gradlew wrapperValidation

      - name: Zip workflow directory
        run: |
          zip -r workflows.zip .github/workflows

      - name: Upload workflows.zip artifact
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: workflows-zip
          path: workflows.zip
